          <title>
            <string language="en">Hexagonal close-packed unit cell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sechseckige schließen-gepackte Maßeinheit Zelle</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the unit cell in a hexagonal close-packed structure.</string>
